Title: Episode Four
Plot: Since attending the superpower support group, Rudy's alter ego Rudy Two has become more of his own person. And while the gang are out on community service they come across a bumbling old man who turns out to be more than he seems. They also encounter Helen, an electrician with a power that might just hold the key to understanding the 'mysterious knitted jumper'.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, sexual violence, offensive language and sex scenes
